label: Paper Crafts
description: Supplies and ideas for paper-based crafts, including origami, card making, and decoupage.
intents: Find cheap supplies for card making

subcategories.label: Origami
subcategories.description: Supplies and ideas for origami, the Japanese art of paper folding.

subcategories.label: Card Making
subcategories.description: Supplies and ideas for making handmade cards for various occasions.

subcategories.label: Decoupage
subcategories.description: Supplies and ideas for decoupage, the art of decorating objects with paper cutouts.

subcategories.label: Paper Cutting
subcategories.description: Supplies and ideas for paper cutting, the art of cutting paper into intricate designs.

subcategories.label: Quilling
subcategories.description: Supplies and ideas for quilling, the art of rolling and shaping paper strips into decorative designs.
